name: Moots AI
long_description:
Moots AI is a private business network powered by your AI Chief of Staff. Designed for busy founders, executives, and super-connectors. It intelligently surfaces deal flow, career opportunities, and strategic connections:

- Automates your rolodex by importing iPhone contacts and syncing with Google, then enriching every profile with real-time data on prospects, clients, investors, and more.

- Builds rich dossiers you can augment with voice notes, custom labels, and contextual snippets—so every detail stays at your fingertips.

- Remembers—and acts on every interaction, using AI to surface deal flow, uncover career opportunities, and identify strategic introductions.

- Drafts perfect outreach and nudges you at exactly the right moment, ensuring you never miss a chance to deepen relationships or close the next big opportunity.

With Moots AI, your network isn’t just stored—it’s supercharged.
one_liner: A private business network powered by an AI Chief of Staff.
